summary: Completed comprehensive testing of sports betting guide application. Backend APIs fully functional, but critical frontend issues found on match detail page and parlay builder.

critical_bugs.issue: React runtime errors preventing page from loading - 'Objects are not valid as a React child' error
critical_bugs.error_details: Multiple React reconciliation errors in bundle.js preventing match detail page from rendering

ui_bugs.issue: UI overlay preventing clicks on filter dropdowns
ui_bugs.workaround: Force clicks work but normal clicks are intercepted

ui_bugs.issue: Match selection dropdown appears empty despite matches being available

passed_tests: Homepage loads with 45 match cards from API-Football
Navigation works: Dashboard, Leagues, Parlay Builder accessible
Match cards display team logos, scores, dates correctly
Sport filter dropdown contains Football/Basketball options
League filter dropdown works and shows all leagues
Leagues page shows all 7 football leagues + EuroLeague (8 total)
League cards navigate to standings pages successfully
Standings page shows league table with 20 teams, positions, points, form
Parlay Builder page loads and Add Selection dialog opens
Backend API /api/leagues returns all expected leagues
Backend API /api/matches returns match data with proper structure
Backend API /api/standings/{league_id} returns valid standings data
Sport and league filtering works correctly in backend
Dark theme and responsive design implemented correctly

critical_fixes: Fix React runtime errors on match detail page - likely issue with rendering player injury data or AI analysis objects
Debug and fix match selection dropdown in Parlay Builder not populating with available matches
Resolve UI overlay issues preventing normal clicks on filter dropdowns
action_item_for_main_agent.priority: CRITICAL - Match detail page completely broken
action_item_for_main_agent.testing_notes: Backend is fully functional. Frontend navigation and basic pages work, but core match detail functionality is broken.

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Major pages load but critical match detail page broken
